feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA2][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 28, 20:00 - 23:59 UTC

Sep 14, 19:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/09/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 28/09/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned devices for 30 minutes each one.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46I26
entry.content:
Sep 19, 16:04 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/09/2022 14:57 UTC
End Time : 19/09/2022 15:54 UTC
Root cause : A network device was at fault.
Comment : Finally the network equipment is functional again after some reboot. All servers are back in service.

Sep 19, 15:42 UTC
Identified - Update : A network equipment is faulty, our teams will replace it.

Sep 19, 15:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/09/2022 14:57 UTC
Service impact : All servers on rack 46I26 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are in the process of identifying the cause of the downtime.

entry.title: [GRA3][DedicatedServers] - Rack GRA0316B03C
entry.content:
Sep 19, 13:13 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/09/2022 12:26 UTC
End Time : 19/09/2022 12:52 UTC
Root cause : The servers were unavailable due to a circuit breaker that tripped during the following maintenance: https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/4nrd13hxfgfg
Comment : The incident is closed, all servers are back in service.

Sep 19, 12:44 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/09/2022 12:26 UTC
Service impact : Servers on rack GRA0316B03C are down.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
